title: Campaign Ribbon, "Theodore Roosevelt", 1904
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 13 x 5.1 cm (5 1/8 x 2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Boris Kroll
description: Black and white woven souvenir with a portrait of Theodore Roosevelt from the 1904 presidential election. Inscription across the top reads "For President. 1904." Along the bottom is the woven signature "Theodore Roosevelt" and the word "Republican."

exhibitions.title: Shahzia Sikander Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Campaign Ribbon, "Theodore Roosevelt", 1904.
1904. Medium: silk
Technique: jacquard woven. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Boris Kroll. 1982-52-6.
